Posted By: Havens (6/15/2010 5:35:02 AM)

posts.post_content: R&D: So let's see what we got. A picture of a strafing tree. Now put on a totally irrelevant name, Bog-Strider Ash, yeah. Also a totally generic mana cost. He seems defense-ey, so 1/6 could work... Wait no, 2/4 just for lulz. Give him a totally radical ability... Swampwalk does it, since his random name says bog-strider anyways. A totally conditional Dragon's Claw would totally confuse 'em, whenever a player casts a... a...... Goblin spell, yeah that's right; they gotta pay a green too, we don't want this to be too good, hehe. Now just slap a stupidly irrelevant flavor text. They'll sure love this.
posts.html:

Posted By: Woozly (7/20/2011 1:22:26 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This guy is funky. Not only are the ability's weird, but when playing with goblins you want to unload your hand as fast as possible. You cannot take advantage of his ability fast enough, you need to summon goblins after you drop him, and most goblins are 1-3 drop that want to be out fast. Not only that, you have to feed a green mana to use it, and 2 life is not worth the hassle at all.  
  
Perhaps you can come up with a bounce engine plus [Raging Goblin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Raging Goblin) and this guy, but then congrats you are using at least 3 cards + ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) to gain 2 life a turn!!!!!   
  
Not good a good card at all, but then again they all cant be winners.
posts.html:
This guy is funky. Not only are the ability's weird, but when playing with goblins you want to unload your hand as fast as possible. You cannot take advantage of his ability fast enough, you need to summon goblins after you drop him, and most goblins are 1-3 drop that want to be out fast. Not only that, you have to feed a green mana to use it, and 2 life is not worth the hassle at all.

Perhaps you can come up with a bounce engine plus Raging Goblin and this guy, but then congrats you are using at least 3 cards + to gain 2 life a turn!!!!!

Not good a good card at all, but then again they all cant be winners.

posts.post_content:
I feel like this should just have given you the 2 life without spending any mana.
